AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hold-Loord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] inherited the throne of [PAWN_possessive] father, leading a hold of thirteen towns. [PAWN_pronoun] was a strong and courageous leader, but did not deal with peasant work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Town-Loord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] inherited the throne of [PAWN_possessive] father, looking after a single town. [PAWN_pronoun] was known as a kind and generous leader who would frequently help the townspeople.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court scribe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a scribe for the town Loord, writing addresses and keeping stock of the town's trade and diplomacy. This meant [PAWN_pronoun] had little time for actual warfare.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court fool
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fool in the Loord's Court, entertaining the nobles with [PAWN_possessive] silly tricks, zany jokes and inane pranks. [PAWN_pronoun] was never a very smart Leeani.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a guard in the Loord's Court, protecting the Loord from (admittedly few) attacks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court archer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an archer in the tower above the Loord's Court, protecting the Loord from (admittedly few) distant attacks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court steward
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a steward in the court of [PAWN_possessive] Loord. [PAWN_pronoun] cooked and cleaned, and attended to visitors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had an esteemed position in [PAWN_possessive] town's community. Peasant work was below [PAWN_objective], and [PAWN_pronoun] took to the fine arts instead.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Arkhaevest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: The Arkhaev is a sacred place of knowledge for Leeani, a store of books and relics of ages past. [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the collection, taking in knowledge and preserving it for future generations, at the expense of other skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Leeani champion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a championed Leeani warrior, excelling in the physical realm. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] is not the most creative person and prefers other Leeani to make [PAWN_possessive] weapons.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Captain of the guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is captain of the guard. [PAWN_pronoun] orders and protects the soldiers underneath [PAWN_objective], but will not back away from a fight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mad surgeon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes cutting limbs off. [PAWN_pronoun] really likes it. But [PAWN_pronoun] makes a good doctor. Let [PAWN_nameDef] in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Town doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a talented surgeon and doctor in [PAWN_possessive] town. [PAWN_nameDef]'s profession didn't leave much room for the arts, though, and [PAWN_pronoun] found HIMself without a creative bone in [PAWN_possessive] body.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] became an explorer, destined to find new and faster ways to get form place to place - and to seek out and tag enemies before the garrison's main forced arrived. This lifestyle left [PAWN_objective] somewhat isolated, however.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Town engineer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Planning the expansion of Leeani Holds was a foremost task for [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] was very good at it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Peasant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] adult life in the gutters and farms. [PAWN_pronoun] never learned the fine arts or even how to write, but [PAWN_pronoun] can at least be useful in menial tasks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with all manner of farm animals, ensuring they were well-fed. [PAWN_pronoun] always kept the runts as [PAWN_possessive] own pet, but this didn't leave [PAWN_objective] with an education.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] supplied the holdspeople with a great bounty of meat from the large herds of deer that roamed nearby.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Market artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] sat in the hold square, drawing the people and places [PAWN_pronoun] saw. He became very good at what [PAWN_pronoun] did, but never really developed a liking for menial tasks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hold settler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked to build new towns and settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't really live at any of them and instead was a contract settler.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hold mercenary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gun-for-hire, keeping communities safe and fighting rival factions for a good price.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nomad trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed from town to town, looking to make profits off the items [PAWN_pronoun] carted around, and often had to defend himself from bandits on the road. However, an education eluded him where a silver tongue did not.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Self-made baker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] baked all kinds of delicious pastries and pies, and [PAWN_pronoun] even built his own shop from the ground up.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Loord-eir
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the heir (or Eir) to the throne of [PAWN_possessive] father's hold. This mean [PAWN_pronoun] learned all manner of high arts, a decent education and social connections, but lacked practical ability.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Pathfinder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth exploring the regions around [PAWN_possessive] town, venturing into caves and climbing trees. [PAWN_pronoun] became very competent as surviving on his own from [PAWN_possessive] frequent camping trips.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Scullery maid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a maid in the Loord's Court, washing dishes and setting tables. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned recipes and good social conduct.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Carpenter's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Working with lumber and tools was easy for [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] quickly grew an appreciation for construction and work. However, [PAWN_pronoun] always found [PAWN_pronoun] lacked the dexterity to make more intricate pieces.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Smithy's apprentice
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Carting hot metal around the smith was [PAWN_nameDef]'s daily job, and was often asked to fetch ores from the mines. All was going well until [PAWN_pronoun] spilled molten steel and started a fire that burned the smith down.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Builder's hand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] liked helping [PAWN_possessive] father build houses for other Leeani, and [PAWN_pronoun] found he had a passion for construction. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't have much time to talk to others, though.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmkit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on [PAWN_possessive] parent's farm, tending to crops and chickens alike. As such [PAWN_pronoun] never recieved a proper education that left [PAWN_objective] with a lack of appreciation for art and knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Arkhaevkit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted [PAWN_possessive] elders in keeping the local Arkhaev in order, dusting the books and polishing the artefacts. Often [PAWN_pronoun]'d find a way to repair a defunct treasure, which made [PAWN_objective] very popular.
